snippet.title: Dashero: Sword & Magic - Age of Calamity
snippet.description:
When all warriors fall in the age of calamity, new heroes rise...

**** New Roguelite Arcade Game in 2020 ****
Pre-Order now for free!
App Store (iOS):
https://apps.apple.com/app/id1504030024
Google Play (Android):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.trefle.dashero

This is a casual action with melee and shooting in one single control.
You can greatly enjoy the game without network with full high quality 3D.

Cheers!

Welcome for any feedback:
https://facebook.com/dasherogame
